column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Ordered the fried chicken nuggets
column2: it was delicous. They were very crispy but also very moist and it was seasoned well
column3: I would order these again. The takoyaki was also very good
column4: it had a lot of octopus in it unlike other places like kubos. The ramen was alright
column5: I had ordered the spicy miso. The broth was mediocre
column6: I think the broth at ramen Jin is much more rich and seasoned better. I would definitely come again for those nuggets
